summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Human Services Department; increasing expenditure allowance in the 1999 budget of the Human Services Department to assist people who are homeless, particularly families with children and homeless women, to access emergency shelter and other services by making a reimbursable appropriation and transfer from the Supplemental Appropriation Account of the Emergency Subfund; all by a three-quarters vote of the City Council.
committee: Housing, Human Services and Civil Rights
